description.lang: Product features:- Scene inclusion for custom automation scenarios when included to a Z-Wave gateway controller- Z-Wave Plus with improved 500 chip for faster and safer wireless communication- Signal repeater for a stronger, more reliable network - 2 USB charging ports for your smart phone or tablet (no Z-Wave functionality)- Built-in overload protectionSpecifications:Z-Wave Signal Frequency: 908.42 MHzPower: 110VMaximum Load: 15Amps TOTAL between 5 outletsUSB Charging Port Power: 5V 1A eachCord Length: 3 ftRange: Up to 100 feet line of sightInstallation and Use: Indoor only
